item.title: Cloud
item.description: plybuild supports cloud configuration for some of its more advanced features. A cloud configuration is simply an available git repository referred to in the local config file ~/.plybuild/local-config.yaml. An example is shipped with plybuild at https://github.com/plybuild/plybuild-config. Requirements The requirements for the cloud config repository is that there exists a template folder, and a deprecated.json and services.json,file on the root level. item.title: Local
item.description: The first time running plybuild a ~/.plybuild configuration folder is created with a ~/.plybuild/local-config.yaml file. The contents of this file by default are: cloudConfig: git: url: https://github.com/plybuild/plybuild-config.git
